title: WebGPU: the cross-platform graphics API of tomorrow
description: For web developers, WebGPU is a web graphics API that provides a unified and fast access to GPUs by exposing modern hardware capabilities and allowing rendering and computation operations on a GPU, similar to Direct3D 12, Metal, and Vulkan.
